record.title: ORDERS FOR TUESDAY, MAY 13, 2008
record.narrative:
ORDERS FOR TUESDAY, MAY 13, 2008 -- (Senate - May 12, 2008)

[Page: S4046]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that when the Senate completes its business today, it stand adjourned until 10 a.m. tomorrow, Tuesday, May 13; that following the prayer and the pledge, the Journal of proceedings be approved to date, the morning hour be deemed expired, the time for the two leaders be reserved for use later in the day, and the Senate resume consideration of S. 2284, flood insurance, as under the previous order.
I further ask that the Senate recess from 12:30 until 2:15 p.m. to allow for the weekly caucus luncheons.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
